personalQuests.name: Seeker of Xorn
personalQuests.description: Complete three "Crypt" Scenarios. Then unlock "Noxious Cellar" and follow it to a conclusion

personalQuests.name: Merchant Class
personalQuests.description: Collect the following items

personalQuests.name: Greed Is Good
personalQuests.description: Have 200 gold in your possession

personalQuests.name: Finding the Cure
personalQuests.description: Kill eight Forest Imps. Then unlock "Forgotten Grove" and follow it to a conclusion

personalQuests.name: A study of Anatomy
personalQuests.description: Experience your party members becoming exhausted fifteen times

personalQuests.name: Law Bringer
personalQuests.description: Kill twenty Bandits or Cultists

personalQuests.name: Pounds of Flesh
personalQuests.description: Kill fifteen Vermlings

personalQuests.name: Trophy Hunt
personalQuests.description: Kill twenty different types of monsters

personalQuests.name: Eternal Wanderer
personalQuests.description: Complete fifteen different scenarios

personalQuests.name: Battle Legend
personalQuests.description: Earn fifteen checkmarks from completed battle goals

personalQuests.name: Implement of Light
personalQuests.description: Find the Skullbane Axe in the Necromancer's Sanctum and then use it to kill seven Living Bones, Living Corpses, or Living Spirits

personalQuests.name: Take back the Trees
personalQuests.description: Complete three scenarios in the Dagger Forest. Then unlock "Foggy Thicket" and follow it to a conclcusion

personalQuests.name: The Thin Places
personalQuests.description: Complete six side scenarios (scenario number > 51)

personalQuests.name: Aberrant Slayer
personalQuests.description: Kill one of each type of Demon

personalQuests.name: Fearless Stand
personalQuests.description: Kill twenty elite monsters

personalQuests.name: Piety in All Things
personalQuests.description: Donate 120 gold to the Sanctuary of the Great Oak

personalQuests.name: Vengeance
personalQuests.description: Complete four scenarios in Gloomhaven. Then unlock "Investigation" and follow it to a conclusion

personalQuests.name: Zealot of the Blood God
personalQuests.description: Become exhausted twelve times

personalQuests.name: Goliath Toppler
personalQuests.description: Complete four boss scenarios

personalQuests.name: The Fall of Man
personalQuests.description: Complete two scenarios in the Lingering Swamp. Then unlock "Fading Lighthouse" and follow it to a conclusion

personalQuests.name: Augmented Abilities
personalQuests.description: Purchase four enhancements (requires "The Power of Enhancement" global achievement)

personalQuests.name: Elemental Samples
personalQuests.description: Complete a scenario in each of the following areas:

personalQuests.name: Augmented Abilities
personalQuests.description: Experience two other characters achieving their personal quests

personalQuests.name: The perfect Poison
personalQuests.description: Kill poisonous enemies
